meanings.definition: A list of items to be checked off as completed.
meanings.sent1: I used the checkoffs to make sure I finished all my chores.
meanings.sent2: She went through the checkoffs on her list one by one.
meanings.sent3: The checkoffs on the grocery list helped me remember everything.
meanings.sent4: The checkoffs on the map guided us through the hiking trail.
meanings.sent5: The checkoffs on the calendar kept me organized and on track.

meanings.definition: The act of marking an item as completed on a checklist.
meanings.sent1: Completing the checkoffs on the list gave me a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent2: He always does the checkoffs quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The checkoffs dance on the paper as I mark each task done.
meanings.sent4: The checkoffs are like little victories waiting to be claimed.
meanings.sent5: The checkoffs are like small celebrations of progress along the way.
